data.title: added huge RA KotH map ATHENA
data.body:
The map has been tested with four players and was reasonably lag free.
Note that this is the newer fixed after the multiplayer playtests - the
one on the openra content site is outdated.

While the map is working perfectly fine, it would be great if
https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/3496 could be implemented. That
way, the player would have multiple starting options.

data.title: Add better implementation of custom starting units
data.body: While it is possible to add custom starting units to the game (i.e. on the map donut-hole), it brings the problem that the starting camera perspective can not be fixed on  position of the player. The player starts staring at a shrouded spot in the middle of nowhere and has to search for his units by scrolling through the map. This is a particular nuisance on large/huge maps such as Zeus or Athena.

data.title: Some new community maps
Detect new maps which where added when openra had already been started
data.body:
This is useful when you have hosted a game and many players have already joined the game lobby. Then you might find out that you need some more fresh maps and download them somewhere. But to choose them in the map chooser you would have to restart the game server. All people would be annoyed then.

data.title: Add game logic for player controlled bombers and torpedo bombers.
data.body:
Currently, it seems that no logic for player controlled 'bombers' and 'torpedo bombers' does exist in the OpenRA mod. I would be great if such a feature could be incorporated, so that new assets could be integrated, and grand scale sea borne maps such as Apollo or Pluto might have additional tactical depth. 

See also https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/3481 for aircraft carriers.
See also http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&p=285423#285423 for graphical assets.

data.title: Game logic for seaborne aircraft carriers
data.body:
Currently, there is no support for aircraft carriers in OpenRA. 

Two kinds of aircraft carriers would be great to have: 

a) a carrier for VTOL type of aircraft (helicopters, harriers), preferably for allies.
b) a carrier of jets e.g. a jump start carrier with a ramp, preferably for soviets.

Planes should be able to land, repair and rearm on carrier vessels. Optionally, carriers should also have on-board weaponry - but this is not necessary.

See also: http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&p=285423#285423

data.body: Fixes #3336.

data.title: movement equivalence classes
data.body:
These can be used as a basis for a bunch of pathing optimizations.
- Feasability of movement can be precomputed for each class, avoiding
  the worst-case pathfinding behavior
- A path could potentially be shared between all members of a class.
  This isnt necessarily the best path for any single unit, as it
  doesn't care about efficiency of movement across various terrain --
  but it would be a "reasonable" path that the whole group could take
  together.
- General pathing checks can be converted from intersection of sets of
  strings to a simple AND.
- Other, wilder things.

data.title: Added Monsters
data.body:
Zombies (promised for ages), giant ants (They came from Red Alert!) plus larvae/queen/hill and the voice files for Stavros/Volkov including an alarm siren from the Counterstrike expansion. Can be used as canon fodder on tower defense like maps or for horror elements in single-player missions. Have fun mappers.

![Zombie Icon](http://content.open-ra.org/users/BaronOfStuff/units/Zombie_Cameo_Icon/preview.gif) [Source](http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=units&id=257) by @BaronOfStuff ![Zombie](http://content.open-ra.org/users/admin/units/Zombie/preview.gif) [Source](http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=units&id=209) uploaded by @ihptru created by @NukemBro

The rest is from the Counterstrike's EXPAND2.MIX and the icon ![Ant icon](http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20060611174919/cnc/images/3/39/Giantant.gif) from http://cnc.wikia.com/wiki/Giant_Ants which looks like a screenshot from the secret ants mission intro converted to the RA palette.

data.title: Favour newer buildings over older buildings when a unit can appear from ...
data.body:
...multiple buildings after being built.
Rationale: players building a second production building in RA are really refining the location where they want their units to appear after being built, so make this assumption until they set a building to primary. RA95 also did this.
